channel.title: I dont get it
channel.description:
why is it that every time that me and my friend climb a ladder or tele somewhere, there's either me or him that's invisable :confused: and every time i climb a ladder i get this error in the client box.
Exeption in thread "Thread-6" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsExeption: 114 at client.method34(client.java:1381) at client.method146(client.java:12090) at client.method102(client.java:7848) at client.method9(client.java:8738) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:122) at client.run(client.java:4429) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

item.title: I dont get it
item.dc:creator: @Macoronizer Macoronizer

I try to put it, but I got a error

item.title: I dont get it
item.dc:creator: @Dark_Soul2 -Dark Soul-
item.description:
@Dark_Soul2 wrote:

When you climb a ladder your server can’t reset you to normal its like this…your server thinks you are normal but your actually above everyone else…but I think you should have a reset command like this…:
} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“ground”)) {
if (teleblock == true) {
sendMessage(“A magical force stops you from teleporting.”); // made by Mod Allstar
} else {
heightLevel = 0;
teleportToX = 2662;
teleportToY = 3309;
sendMessage(“You teleport to Home…fixed”);
}

Enjoy

Read full topic

Did you remeber to put the updaterequred = true
and the apperanceupdate = true?
